info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:14PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Shasta County through 715 PM PDT... At 613 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Johnson Park, or 15 miles southwest of Dana, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Johnson Park, Cassel, Fall River Mills and Burney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
